networkError.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection and ensure the server is running.

step1.title: Step 1: Try it
step1.description: Edit <1>app/(tabs)/index.tsx</1> to see changes. Press <2>{{shortcut}}</2> to open developer tools.

step2.title: Step 2: Explore
step2.description: Tap the Explore tab to learn more about what's included in this starter app.

step3.title: Step 3: Get a fresh start
step3.description: When you're ready, run <1>npm run reset-project</1> to get a fresh <2>app</2> directory. This will move the current <2>app</2> to <2>app-example</2>.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: This app includes example code to help you get started.

fileBasedRouting.title: File-based routing
fileBasedRouting.content: This app has two screens: <1>app/(tabs)/index.tsx</1> and <1>app/(tabs)/explore.tsx</1>.
fileBasedRouting.note: The layout file in <1>app/(tabs)/_layout.tsx</1> sets up the tab navigator.

platformSupport.title: Android, iOS, and web support
platformSupport.content: You can open this project on Android, iOS, and the web. To open the web version, press <1>w</1> in the terminal running this project.

images.title: Images
images.content: For static images, you can use the <1>@2x</1> and <1>@3x</1> suffixes to provide files for different screen densities

themes.title: Light and dark mode components
themes.content: This template has light and dark mode support. The <1>useColorScheme()</1> hook lets you inspect what the user's current color scheme is, and so you can adjust UI colors accordingly.

animations.title: Animations
animations.content: This template includes an example of an animated component. The <1>components/HelloWave.tsx</1> component uses the powerful <2>react-native-reanimated</2> library to create a waving hand animation.
animations.iosNote: The <1>components/ParallaxScrollView.tsx</1> component provides a parallax effect for the header image.
